header.name: Priyanka Nijhawan
header.intro: Meticulously,Dedicated and Value Driven Product Manager with a total of 14+ years of experience successfully uniting internal and external forces to acheive peak efficiency. Covering Project and Product Management and working with different departments, practiced at maintaining harmonious operations while meeting frequently discordant needs of internal personnel, business channel partners and customers.

timelineProps.title: Post Graduate Diploma in Business Analytics (PGDBA)
timelineProps.subTitle: Symbiosis International University

details: Leading the projects by providing end to end support for the databases on DEV, PROD environments (Oracle , MS SQL, Postgres, MySQL).
Supervising the DBA resources in order to achieve highest customer satisfaction and aligning them to the specific projects.
Handling multiple clients 24x7 across the globe.
TUNING the databases to improve the overall performance of the system by using various reporting tools, AWR, ADDM, Database Control, Grid control.
Handling performance issues alone with minimum time on production databases.
Applying security patches every quarter released by Oracle (CPU, PSU).
Handling the onsite delivery of multiple digital projects.
Providing support for Sharjah and Dubai databases.
Working on Oracle, SQL, single instance , RAC and Standby databases.
Applying CPU, PSU patches on database, Standby databases and troubleshooting the patching issues.
Working with the HIS application team to solve the user related queries.
Applying bug fix patches on Oracle Home.
Working on Golden Gate , RAC, Data Guard, OEM.
Patching , upgrade of databases.
Working on 24x7 shift as shift lead managing the on-shift resources.
Troubleshooting database related issues.
Providing support for internal clients of database on multiple platforms.
Handling database related queries.
Oracle installation, creation of new database on windows and UNIX.
Managing table spaces.
Monitoring the database growth.
Installation and configuration of Database.
Manage table spaces.
Patching and upgrading databases.
Backup of database using various tools like Export, RMAN.
Installation and configuration of Oracle Identity Management, Oracle Fusion Middleware SOA.
